padika wedikawakda nagaraye thanin thana athi kuli motar ratha galda thriwil ratha galda iwath kara atha.danata siya kamaththen godanagili kada iwath karaganna godanagili himiyanta wandi mudal labadimatada rajaya thiranaya kara atha.me athara ranwala sita mipitiya dakwa idikarana wikalpa margaye wadada kadinamin nima kara gena yayi.ema margayada manthiru 4k da padika wedikawakda idikere.mema margaye koti gananak waya karamin walimannathota idikara gena yana palame wadada nima wemin pawathi.pola bhumiye sanwardhana wadada kadinamin karagena yana athara, nagaraye kanu paddhathiyada jala widuliyada sanwardhanaya karamin pawathi.2014 jathika uthsawaya samarima kagalla nagarayedi pawathwimata niyamitha nisa nagaraye sanwardhana katayuthu kadinamin kirimata piyawara gena athi bawada disapathiwaraya pawasiya..

palamu puwathpatha eya wunata 1796 di lankawe thapal sewaya aarambha wune gasat pathraya beda harimata bawin lankawe mudrana katayuthu 1790 gananwalama patan gena thibiya yuthuyi.kese wuwath palamu sinhala puwathpatha 'lanka loka'. 1860 galle mudranaya karala thiyenne.
ee pinwath mahana bamuno akusala dharmayange doshaya, lamaka bawa, kelesimada, kusala dharmayangeda, kamayangen wenwimehida aanishansaya, pirisidu bawa nodakithmayi.
ada nodutu lokayen obawa danuwath karanne ema purwa lakshanayan pilibandawayi.
